name: Duelity (Digx7)
description:
Sheriff Daisy and the Alien Parasite find themselves locked in a good old western duel.  In a quick draw, defining life and death, and who gets to walk away.  Where quick thinking and out-witting your opponent may be all that gets you out.  Take control of Daisy in Single player mode or against a friend controlling the alien in Multi Player mode, and duel like your life depends on it.

===============================================================

Controls 

Action —--------------- Key

Player 1 Shoot……..q

Player 1 Dodge…….e

Player 2 Shoot……..i

Player 2 Dodge…….p
